net.proteusframework.core.locale

Class ResourceBundleLocalizedText

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.locale.AbstractLocalizedObject
      • net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedText
        • net.proteusframework.core.locale.ResourceBundleLocalizedText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.CharSequence, java.lang.Cloneable, LocalizedObject, TextSource

    public class ResourceBundleLocalizedText
extends LocalizedText
    A localized text object that updates the text from a resource bundle. This is intended for internal use, applications should use an implementation of LocaleSource, such as ResourceBundleAdapter.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
